message.name: ERR_CASEREFERRALASSISTANT_NO_SUPPLIER
message.locale: Case Referral could not be created. No Service Supplier was specified.

message.name: ERR_REFERRALASSISTANT_XFV_START_ECD
message.locale: Referral start date cannot be later than the expected end date.

message.name: ERR_REFERRALASSISTANT_XFV_STARTDATE_CASESTART
message.locale: The Case Referral start date must not be earlier than case start date (%1d).

message.name: INF_CASEREFERRALASSISTANT_ENDDATE_OUTCOME
message.locale: A referral end date has been recorded, therefore you must enter an outcome.

message.name: INF_CASEREFERRALASSISTANT_RECORDED
message.locale: A referral has been recorded for case %1s of type %2s for %3s.

message.name: INF_CASEREFERRALASSISTANT_RESULT
message.locale: A referral has been entered for case %1s of type %2s for %3s by %4s.

message.name: INF_CASEREFERRALASSISTANTOUTCOME_ENDDATE
message.locale: An outcome has been recorded, therefore you must enter the referral end date.

message.name: INF_CASEREFERRALASSISTANTOUTCOME_RECORDED
message.locale: An outcome has been recorded for the referral of case %1s of type %2s for %3s.

message.name: INF_CASEREFERRALASSISTANTOUTCOME_RESULT
message.locale: An outcome of "%1s" has been entered for case "%2s" by "%3s".

message.name: ERR_CASEREFERRALASSISTANT_NO_STARTDATE
message.locale: A case referral must have a start date.
